definition: classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

sentences.english: Definitive stamps can be reprinted as necessary.
sentences.chinese: 普通郵票可根據需要重印。

sentences.english: They're different from the common ones.
sentences.chinese: 它們和普通郵票是不一樣的。

sentences.english: They 're different from the common ones.
sentences.chinese: 他們和普通郵票是不一樣的。

sentences.english: "Shin" and "Juku" respectively represented brand-new and postal available towns.
sentences.chinese: 新和宿分別代表新的和通郵的市鎮。

sentences.english: Tamika: Could I pick the design of the first-class stamps?
sentences.chinese: 我能選一下普通郵票的圖案？
有紀念郵票和普通郵票。

sentences.english: I need a book of regular stamp and two of airmail.
sentences.chinese: 我要一封普通郵票和兩封航空郵票。

definition: to postpone one's graduation (e.g. by undertaking additional studies) (abbr. for 延後畢業|延后毕业[yan2 hou4 bi4 ye4])
the four great Chinese inventions: paper, printing, magnetic compass and gunpowder
to force sb to buy or sell/to trade using coercion
